states.name: Ready
exit_hints: Must send RESET_STREAM when receiving STOP_SENDING frame

states.name: Send
enter_hints: When sending part of stream enters Send state
exit_hints: Must send RESET_STREAM when receiving STOP_SENDING frame

states.name: Data Sent
exit_hints: May defer sending RESET_STREAM frame when in this state

states.name: Reset Sent
enter_hints: Can immediately transition to Reset Sent after opening stream
